addressbooksyncinterval.description: Normal polling frequency used for address book synchronization in Microsoft Office Outlook.

autocaptureuserstatus.description: Set user status for ADC Suggestions

calendartype.description: Calendar type for the system. Set to Gregorian US by default.

decimalsymbol.description: Symbol used for decimal in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

defaultcountrycode.description: Text area to enter default country code.

fullnameconventioncode.description: Order in which names are to be displayed in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

helplanguageid.description: Unique identifier of the Help language.

homepagesubarea.description: Web site page for the user.

lastalertsviewedtime.description: Shows the last time when the traces were read from the database.

localeid.description: Unique identifier of the user locale.

pmdesignator.description: PM designator to use in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

workdaystoptime.description: Workday stop time for the user.

drmmetadata.description: Metadata optional object used to describe this entry.

datavalidationmodeforexporttoexcel.description: Information that specifies the level of data validation in excel worksheets exported in a format suitable for import.

defaultsearchexperience.description: Default search experience for the user.

entityformmode.description: Indicates the form mode to be used.

getstartedpanecontentenabled.description: Information that specifies whether the Get Started pane in lists is enabled.

ignoreunsolicitedemail.description: Information that specifies whether a user account is to ignore unsolicited email (deprecated).

enum: Email messages in response to Dynamics 365 email
Email messages from Dynamics 365 Leads, Contacts and Accounts
Email messages from Dynamics 365 records that are email enabled

isappsforcrmalertdismissed.description: Show or dismiss alert for Apps for 365.

isautodatacaptureenabled.description: Indicates whether to use the Auto Capture feature enabled or not.

isdefaultcountrycodecheckenabled.description: Enable or disable country code selection .

isduplicatedetectionenabledwhengoingonli.description: Indicates if duplicate detection is enabled when going online.

isemailconversationviewenabled.description: Enable or disable email conversation view on timeline wall selection.

isresourcebookingexchangesyncenabled.description: Indicates if the synchronization of user resource booking with Exchange is enabled at user level.

issendasallowed.description: Indicates if send as other user privilege is enabled or not.

reportscripterrors.description: Picklist for selecting the user preference for reporting scripting errors.

enum: Ask me for permission to send an error report to Microsoft
Automatically send an error report to Microsoft without asking me for permission
Never send an error report to Microsoft about Microsoft Dynamics 365

showweeknumber.description: Information that specifies whether to display the week number in calendar displays in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

synccontactcompany.description: Indicates if the company field in Microsoft Office Outlook items are set during Outlook synchronization.

usecrmformforappointment.description: Indicates whether to use the Microsoft Dynamics 365 appointment form within Microsoft Office Outlook for creating new appointments.

usecrmformforcontact.description: Indicates whether to use the Microsoft Dynamics 365 contact form within Microsoft Office Outlook for creating new contacts.

usecrmformforemail.description: Indicates whether to use the Microsoft Dynamics 365 email form within Microsoft Office Outlook for creating new emails.

usecrmformfortask.description: Indicates whether to use the Microsoft Dynamics 365 task form within Microsoft Office Outlook for creating new tasks.

useimagestrips.description: Indicates whether image strips are used to render images.

visualizationpanelayout.description: The layout of the visualization pane.
